rounds.comments: (Alex: Plays with "M-E", those two letters in their titles.)

clues.text: Success came gentlemanly calling for Tennessee Williams after this play, his first big hit

In Windows hitting Ctrl-C & then Ctrl-V performs these 2 artsy & crafty actions

though...the passing there/
had worn them really about the same"
